TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MouseButtonConstants extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: 提供與 Visual Basic 6.0 中切換參數遮罩常數相容的常數。

span.span: Provides constants for compatibility with the shift parameter mask constants in Visual Basic 6.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Visual Basic 6.0 中，滑鼠按鈕參數遮罩常數用來代表中的滑鼠按鈕狀態`Button`各種滑鼠事件處理常式的參數。In Visual Basic 6.0, mouse button parameter mask constants were used to represent the state of mouse buttons in the `Button` parameter of various mouse event handlers. 在 Visual Basic 中的滑鼠事件的參數已變更而且不再需要這些常數。In Visual Basic, the parameters for mouse events have changed and these constants are no longer necessary. 這些常數可啟用從 Visual Basic 6.0，才能繼續執行不需要進一步修改已升級的程式碼。These constants enable code that has been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to run without further modification. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 .NET Framework 實作有顯著差異時，才會需要這些函式和物件。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the .NET Framework implementation. ## Examples

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MouseButtonConstants LeftButton = int32(1)

summary.span: 相當於 Visual Basic 6.0 常數 。

span.span: Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant .
